channel.title: VimR with NeoVim
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates for VimR.

item.title: SNAPSHOT-284
item.description: • GH-443: vimr --line ${LINE_NUMBER} ${SOME_FILE} will open the file and go to the given line. If the file is already open in a UI window, then that window will be selected and the cursor will be moved to the given line. This can be used e.g. to reverse-search LaTeX. Note that you have to re-install the vimr tool.
